name: travel_delays
rows: Road work on I-476 South. The right shoulder is closed.
Disabled vehicle on I-81 northbound at Exit: REST AREA TRAILERS TRUCKS/WEIGH STATTION. There is a ramp restriction.
Multi vehicle crash on US 22 both directions at BEULAH RD. There is a traffic disruption.
Road work on I-76 East. The right lane is closed.
Disabled vehicle on I-78 westbound between Mile Post: 47.5 and Mile Post: 46.0. There is a lane restriction.
Multi vehicle crash on WINDY HILL RD both directions at APPLE BLOSSOM RD. All lanes now open.
Crash on PA 114 westbound at Exit: I-83 NORTH - HARRISBURG. There is a ramp closure.
Vehicle recovery/follow up on I-70 westbound .5 miles west of Exit 49: SMITHTON. All lanes now open.
Moving roadwork on US 422 westbound between Exit: I-176 SOUTH - MORGANTOWN and Exit: US 422 EAST BUS - PENN ST/READING. There is a traffic disruption.
I-579 HOV LN / HOV LN TO/FR MELLON AR RD
Roadwork on I-579 HOV LN / HOV LN TO/FR MELLON AR RD both directions between Exit: BEDFORD AV /+ MARIO LEMIEUX PL and Exit: HOV LN TO/FR NORTHSHORE. All lanes closed.
Roadwork on HOV LN TO/FR NORTHSHORE both directions between Exit: MAZEROSKI WY /+ PNC PARK/HEINZ FIELD and Exit: LC TO PERRY HW. All lanes closed.
Police activity on I-81 northbound .6 miles south of Exit 45: COLLEGE STREET. All lanes now open.
Roadwork on I-70 westbound between .1 miles west of Exit 46: PA 51 PITTSBURGH UNIONTOWN and .8 miles west of Exit 46: PA 51 PITTSBURGH UNIONTOWN. There is a lane restriction.
Roadwork on I-90 eastbound 1.3 miles east of Exit 29: PA 8 HAMMETT AND PARADE ST. There is a lane restriction.
Roadwork on PA 51 northbound between CONCORD LN and MCKENERY DR, SNYDER LN. There is a lane restriction.
LEESBURG STATION RD / LEESBURG RD / BRENT RD
Utility work on LEESBURG STATION RD / LEESBURG RD / BRENT RD westbound between CREEK RD and INDIAN RUN RD. There is a lane restriction.
Roadwork on PA 51 southbound between MCKENERY DR, SNYDER LN and Exit 46A: I-70 WEST - WASHINGTON PA. There is a lane restriction.
Roadwork on SR 3019 SH southbound between TYLER HILL RD and MCCANN RD. All lanes now open.
LANDENBERG RD / SUNNY DELL RD / CHESTERVILLE RD / NEWARK RD
Utility work on LANDENBERG RD / SUNNY DELL RD / CHESTERVILLE RD / NEWARK RD both directions between LAUREL HEIGHTS RD and EGYPT RUN RD. There is a traffic disruption.
Roadwork on US 220 southbound between Exit: THOMAS ST and 1 miles SOUTH of Exit: THOMAS ST. There is a lane restriction.
LANDENBERG RD / SUNNY DELL RD / CHESTERVILLE RD / NEWARK RD
Utility work on LANDENBERG RD / SUNNY DELL RD / CHESTERVILLE RD / NEWARK RD both directions between MCKEAN DR and CHESTERVILLE RD, SKYCREST DR. There is a traffic disruption.
Utility work on I-79 northbound .9 miles north of Exit 55: HEIDELBERG/KIRWAN HEIGHTS. There is a ramp restriction.
Roadwork on US 22 eastbound at ELMERTON AV, WILDWOOD PARK DR. There is a lane restriction.
Crash on BARRVILLE RD both directions between SR 0655 SH and GREEN LN. All lanes closed.
Utility work on PA 65 both directions between ALLEN ST and PEARSON ST. There is a lane restriction.
